original: simpl. intros m x H1 H2 H3. unfold expf. unfold not. split. - intros H. split. + intros [H4|H4]. apply H4 with (z:=x). apply H2. + intros [H4|H4]. * apply H4. apply H2. * apply H in H4. contradiction. - intros H H4. apply H. + apply H2. + intros H5. apply H. apply H2. apply H3. apply H5.
